definition: a person that will park and fetch cars for people using a business, restaurant or service, to serve as a personal attendant to
details:
noun
- a person that will park and fetch cars for people using a business, restaurant or service
= example: a person that will park and fetch cars for people using a business, restaurant or service
- a manservant who acts as a personal attendant to their employer
= example: a manservant who acts as a personal attendant to their employer
= synonyms: man
verb
- to serve as a personal attendant to
= example: to serve as a personal attendant to
